ygData.subject: Re: lifetap for ve
ygData.msgSnippet: To brian and everyone else, How about we just make VE as powerful as the very same necro spell is... I know that a necro around level 18 can tap for like 30
ygData.messageBody:
To brian and everyone else,

How about we just make VE as powerful as the very same
necro spell is... I know that a necro around level 18
can tap for like 30 dmg+... Ve maybe goes off 3 times
a fight in cazic unless i have the shaman buff on(i am
DE) i am not sure what the level the upgrades to VE
are for the necros but if they are level appropriate
for our levels (i.e. half) we should get those soon.

Some more suggestions for spells.

After level 22 take away our pet spells becuase the
last time i used my pet was in south karana but now i
am cazic and i don't use it(i always joke with my
groups that i am gonna summon my pet and they go crazy
on me) and give us some other spell, maybe damage
shield or lifetap.

GIVE US BACK BLOOD BOIL AND BANSHE AURA...rangers have
a 6 damage shield at 30 why can't we, the tank masters
of damage, have banshee aura(8 damage) at 30 or 39 i
forgot what level it was. i know this spell went
research only but maybe you could make an sk only
version of the spell.... also about replacing blood
boil with dooming darkness i can see myself saying
this to my group

"guys don't root, snare, or anything cause my level 20
something necro dot that gets resisted all the
time(from what i've heard) gets cancelled by those
spells"

And our level 49 ultra vision and underwater breathing
spells do need to be either at an earlier time or
removed i mean come on those spells are like level
10-20 enchanter spells and we have to wait to get to
49 to get them and then they suck anyway.

Tekman Hatebringer
Level 27
Rodcet Nife
